body.name: Brickhouse Security Livewire Volt GPS Tracking Device for Cars, 4G LTE Wired Car Tracker, Mapping, & Fleet Security - Unlock Real-Time 24/7 Vehicle Surveillance & Easy Install - Subscription Required
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 24 mins
features: SECURE & RELIABLE TRACKING DEVICE: Brickhouse's GPS Tracker Tag for cars is a secure and reliable option for tracking vehicle location and speed. This car GPS tracking device can be hidden anywhere on your vehicle to track and secure it 24/7, with real-time monitoring, covert alarms, and precise routes.

EASY INSTALLATION: This GPS tracker is a discrete tracking device, easy to use and simple to install, utilizing the car's own battery. We also have videos online that walk you through the installation step by step. Monitor vehicles without the hassle of charging the battery with our powerful, easy-to-install GPS vehicle finder.

INSTANT MONITORING: Unveil effortless and swift tracking with our hidden car tracker device. Our mobile app is compatible with both iPhone and Android and offers real-time updates every 30-60 seconds via 4G LTE signals. Opt for our premium subscription to enjoy updates every five seconds. Safeguard every angle, even the blind spots, with our comprehensive line of car trackers for your vehicle.

YOUR VEHICLE'S SILENT PROTECTOR: Introducing an unmatched level of security. Our covert car tracker operates discreetly, powered effortlessly by your vehicle. Stay updated with real-time alerts via our intuitive app, providing a watchful eye over your valued vehicle without intrusiveness.

"AFFORDABLE SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS: Choose from 3 affordable plans for as low as $17.99 a month. $17.99 (BASIC), $27.99 (PLUS), or $34.99 (PREMIUM). You can go monthly, quarterly, or annually depending on your preference. No contracts, cancel anytime for a hassle-free experience. Our tracking device includes a Spark Nano 7.0 wall charger, a user's guide, and a pre-installed SIM card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great GPS Tracker Device
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the most advanced GPS tracker for my car, and I am thrilled to share my exceptional experience with it. This cutting-edge device has truly revolutionized the way I ensure the safety and security of my vehicle. During installation process I've received the support of Rafael, and he was friendly and very helpful. This GPS tracker has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Its exceptional accuracy, discreet design, extensive features, user-friendly interface, and unmatched security measures make it a game-changer for car safety. If you're looking for a reliable and advanced GPS tracker for your vehicle, I highly recommend considering this outstanding device. It's truly worth every penny for the peace of mind it provides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great reliable product!
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased three GPS trackers with this company and absolutely love them. I have the hardwire version as well as a magnetic style, both are very easy to install. The magnetic box is super strong and will not fall off if equipped on a vehicle. I have several cars that I need to track daily and the gps location has always been very accurate. I also enjoy how simple the phone app is to pull up and immediately see where all my cars are located at any given time. Highly recommend these products and their customer service has always been top notch if I need to contact them. Airish provided my most recent service extension request and she was great to work with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install & seems accurate
reviews.reviewText: November 18, 2022 UpdateI've updated my rating from 4 to 5 stars due to this products reliability and great customer service/tech support. I'm still learning all the capabilities of the tracker, most of which I don't need, but if you have a fleet of vehicles, or your want to maintain detailed metrics on the usage/cost of operation, this product should do a great job for you. Their tech support team, especially Julius is outstanding and very helpful.Happy Holidays!I've only had the device a couple of weeks, but so far I'm mostly happy with it's capabilities. The installation was quick and easy, although the wiring is short and could be a problem for you depending on the location you need to attach it to the car. The software is somewhat daunting and confusing and I'm still working on going through the tutorials, so hopefully things will start to fall into place soon. The pricing for the monthly service is misleading in that to have access to up to date info on the location of your vehicle more than three times each 24 hours, you have to pay quite a bit more per month to have unlimited data, which was very disappointing, but might be justified, depending on the strength and reliability of the product. I'll write an update in a couple of months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect so far!
reviews.reviewText: So far it seems to work really well! It has exceeded my expectations, honestly! I thought there would possibly be issues because the Apple Air Tag I had purchased for the same purposes LITERALLY only worked when the car was parked directly in front of the house, which is something I didn't need a tracking device to tell me!I opted to pay for a year of service because it comes out to be less that way, but it still cost over $200. But it has several different services and notifications available within the app which makes it worth it.The install and set up was quick and easy! Well, kind of! Discovered a stripped bolt on the negative battery terminal which ended up having to be replaced, but that had nothing to do with the device! And I really like that it's hard wired and not something that I need to remember to take off and recharge every week, because for sure I would forget!!It isn't quite as inconspicuous as the manufacturer claims being that it is about 4"x2" and has to be mounted in a specific and not hidden way to ensure accuracy, but that part wasn't a concern for me seeing as how it was for my own car! Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well in "normal temperatures" to monitor new teen driver
reviews.reviewText: Husband hooked it up to car battery w/ ease. Took about 8 hrs (overnight) to sync up completely w/ the GPS. But after that it was good to go. Online tutorials are very helpful to learn all the applications. Some we don't need. We use it mainly for tracking new teen driver, speed and car location. Will a be handy if car is ever stolen....you never know....Update 3 months later: This GPS still gives me a peace of mind and works great - WHEN it works. Apparently, it doesn't like cold weather and it won't track reliably, nor monitor the vehicle on those days. It is only Fall in the eastern U.S. and hasn't even hit below freezing weather yet. This is unfortunate because I really like the product when it works.Update 6 months later: still happy with the performance of this GPS - WHEN it works. Unfortunately, it is not reliable during the winter temperatures in the mid-eastern USA. On most days below 30 F degrees, it reports that the car has remained in my driveway when it has actually been gone for hours. This is disappointing 😥

This device is very cool, easy to install, and most importantly, it is very accurate. They also have excellent and fast technical support services. I spoke this morning with (Trish) and he was very professional and fast. I am very happy with this device.

reviews.reviewerName: bought this livewire volt and works perfectly, easy to install and track your assets, Kelvin helped me to active my device and went above and beyond. -R
reviews.reviewText: bought this livewire volt and works perfectly, easy to install and track your assets, Kelvin helped me to active my device and went above and beyond.
Keeps track of my rental vehicle. Accurate location with speed and route records.Will purchase another for my next vehicles
Quick and easy to set up. Accurate updates. Only thing is I wish I knew how to(if possible) to change the miles to Km reading.
